content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Building works includes public housing, medical centre, hawker centre, commercial/social communal facilities with two-level basement carpark.
CLIENT

Housing & Development Board

LOCATION

Admiralty Integrated Development at Woodlands Neighbourhood 6 Contract 26

COMPLETION YEAR

2017

AWARDS
  • Design of the Year award at the President’s Design Award Singapore 2020
  • Urban Land Institute (ULI) Global Awards for Excellence 2021
  • BCA Construction Excellence Award, Commercial / Mixed Development Buildings Category – Excellence 2019
  • BCA Construction Productivity Award (Projects) – Platinum, 2019
  • HDB Construction Award 2018
  • Skyrise Greenery Awards 2017 (Outstanding & Excellence (Community Facility) Awards)
  • WSH Performance (SHARP) Award 2017
  • BCA BIM Awards 2017 (Projects Category – Gold)
  • BCA Green Mark Gold Plus Award, 2016 (Residential Category)
  • BCA Green Mark Gold Plus Award, 2015 (Non-Residential Category)
